entities.name: mr weasleys
entities.description: Mr. and Mrs. Weasleys are mentioned as the source of voices coming from the parlor. They are arguing about whether to tell Harry something or not.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a 13-year-old boy who has a right to know something. He is also described as being happy not knowing what his parents are talking about.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley and Harry have an argument, but it is not clear what the topic of the argument is.
Mr. Weasley disagrees with Fudge about how to treat Harry.
